column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Mivli has a request which involves more than a little danger.
Survey the designated location and slay an overgrown megamaguey for its enlarged bulb.
Deliver the enlarged bulb to Mivli.
Say, you look like an intrepid individual. I could really use your help with something.
A short ways from here, in Chabameki, exceptionally large─shall we say, overgrown─megamaguey are known to appear.
I'd like you to take one down, and retrieve an enlarged bulb from its body. As for why, I'll tell you upon your return!
Go, my friend, and fell an overgrown megamaguey! I need an enlarged bulb from its body. I'll tell you why later!
Welcome back! How did you fare?
A perfect specimen! This will surely make for fine mezcal!
Tell me, were you aware that it was actually the peoples of Xak Tural who taught we Pelupelu how to make mezcal?
They taught us to make the liquor with agave, but we also learned that using the bulb of a megamaguey gives the drink a real kick.
And the megamaguey would give <Emphasis>me</Emphasis> a real kick if I tried to procure their bulbs myself.
Which is why I can't thank you enough for your help! I've no doubt the batch of mezcal I make with this will be a delight!
